bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: The plugin is broken, I have this message when connecting "Null value for $.viewer.message_threads.sync_sequence_id" This version is a little old, and new versions are available that solve this problem. https://github.com/dequis/purple-facebook/issues/306 https://github.com/dequis/purple-facebook/releases
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable):
purple-facebook-0.0.0.20160409-0.4.git66ee773.fc25.x86_64
How reproducible:
Steps to Reproduce: 1. 2. 3.
Actual results:
Expected results:
Additional info:
purple-facebook-0.9.3-1.c9b74a765767.el6 has been submitted as an update to Fedora EPEL 6. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2017-3358363ace
purple-facebook-0.9.3-1.c9b74a765767.el7 has been submitted as an update to Fedora EPEL 7. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2017-7a32db6d7a
purple-facebook-0.9.3-1.c9b74a765767.fc24 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 24. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-2d2502e6b2
purple-facebook-0.9.3-1.c9b74a765767.fc25 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 25. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-6edfa17138
purple-facebook-0.9.3-1.c9b74a765767.fc26 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 26. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-9aa9f4aa6a
All these updates are in updates-testing already. Please update using `dnf --enablerepo=*testing update purple-facebook` and if it works give it karma. =)
The update works as expected, thanks

purple-facebook-0.9.3-1.c9b74a765767.fc26 has been pushed to the Fedora 26 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-9aa9f4aa6a
